data.actual_result: Typing cursor appears at the beginning of your username upon opening your My Account settings
data.expected_result: Either the cursor is not shown initially until you actually go to change your username by opening the keyboard or the cursor is shown at the end of your username
data.short_description: Typing cursor inserted at the beginning of your username in User Settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your User Settings - Open your My Account settings and observe the typing cursor being placed in front of your username
